definition: marshland/swamp/salted or pickled vegetables/to mince/to shred/to mince human flesh and bones/Taiwan pr. [ju1]
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
to destroy/to stop
to execute sb and mince his flesh and bones (archaic form of retribution)

sentences.english: The purification ability of Elodea Canadensis Michx is higher than those of Potamogeton Crispus Linn and Ceratophyllum Demersum Linn.
sentences.chinese: 伊樂藻對水體的淨化能力高於菹草和金魚藻。

sentences.english: So Potamageton crispus couldn't survival. (3) Potamageton crispus is a submerged macrophtye which could endure heavy eutrophication water.
sentences.chinese: 菹草是一種對富營養化水體耐受能力較強的沉水植物。

sentences.english: Carotenoids in Potamogeton crispus L. is a natural source of the red pigment in the red yolk of duck eggs.
sentences.chinese: 菹草類胡蘿蔔素是紅心鴨蛋中紅色素的天然來源。
